title: Average U.S. teen Twitter follower count 2015
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly positive which exists from 0_to_100 to 201_to_300.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 201_to_300 to Don't_know.
